messages.subject: something I read
messages.msgSnippet: This morning, while going through what seemed like a thousand e-mails, I lost one from this list. I m not sure who wrote it. It was about asking kids to taste
messages.messageBody:
This morning, while going through what seemed like a thousand e-mails, I lost one from this list. I'm not sure who wrote it. It was about asking kids to taste something.
The appeal and a few other points. I liked it.
May I ask to have that sent to me - off list?
I'd like to read it again...esp...the appeal part.
I have a thing about shell fish so I don't make anyone taste anything...but the rest of the post was very good.

Thanks so much,
Janis

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
